Serialized Form

  • Package coursework

    • Class coursework.MyScene extends Scene implements Serializable

    • Class coursework.MyScene_example extends Scene implements Serializable

  • Package framework

    • Class framework.Scene extends processing.core.PApplet implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      3922098387294872984L

      • Serialized Fields

        • objects

          java.util.Map<K,V> objects
          Map containing all DisplayableObjects in the scene. Keys are identifying Strings, which can be either specified or are automatically generated by the system.
          See Also:
          DisplayableObject, addObjectToScene(DisplayableObject), addObjectToScene(DisplayableObject, String), getObject(String)

        • numObj

          int numObj
          Number of (animated) objects in pushed to Scene

        • numAni

          int numAni
          Number of (animated) objects in pushed to Scene

        • prevTime

          float prevTime
          Runtime variable, marks last time dT was calculated.

        • gl

          processing.opengl.PGL gl
          ADVANCED

          Progressing-OpenGL abstraction layer. Access only from within setupGL or in sub-classes

          See Also:
          setupGL()

        • camera

          Camera camera
          Scene camera. Contains viewing properties. Defaults to framework Camera class. Overload initialise() to set a different Camera. Remember to access as super.camera.

        • initWidth

          int initWidth
          Initial window size.
          See Also:
          setInitWindowSize()

        • initHeight

          int initHeight
          Initial window size.
          See Also:
          setInitWindowSize()

        • bgcolour

          int bgcolour
          Clear colour (i.e. background).
          See Also:
          setBackgroundColour()
